# Release v5.3.5

## Installation

Download the latest release from [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/mgsgde/whisper-shortcut/releases).

## Changes

### New Features

- **Auto-paste after dictation**: New setting to automatically paste transcriptions at the cursor position after dictation. When enabled, WhisperShortcut pastes the result into the focused app so you can keep typing without switching windows.

### Other

- Added user preference for auto-paste in Settings.
- MenuBarController triggers paste after transcription when the option is enabled.

## Full Changelog

For a complete list of changes, see the [full changelog](https://github.com/mgsgde/whisper-shortcut/compare/v5.3.4...v5.3.5).
